item.description:
Judy C with All Star Band Sunday August 29th 7pm

Singer/songwriter/guitarist Judy C performs with her band Sunday August 29th 2010 at 7pm at http://salemgathering... 217 Essex Street in Salem, Ma. 978.744.8444. The Gathering is a great performance space with comfortable seating. It's located two doors down from Rockafellas on the pedestrian walkway portion of Essex Street in downtown Salem. It's in an old bank and the performance is in front of "The Vault".

Judy’s music is folk/rock with Celtic and Americana influences. She will be doing mostly her own music from her debut CD with a few folk tunes mixed in.

Judy’s all star band includes world-renown drummer Dave Mattacks who toured with Jethro Tull and recorded with Paul McCartney, guitarist David Brown who toured with Billy Joel, bassist Richard Gates who performed with Grammy award winning songwriter Paula Cole and violinist Joe Kessler who toured with Robert Plant and Jimmy Page.

$10 suggested donation at the door is appreciated - Thanks for supporting local independent artists.
item.how_to_find_us: I will at the door greeting people

group.name: Women Supporting Women Through Life's Incredible Journeys
